name: zillow
prompt_template:
Scrape exactly {max_results} rental listings visible on this page. For EACH listing card or property shown, extract:
- property_name: the apartment building name or property title
- monthly_rent: the monthly rental price shown (include ranges like $1,739-$2,599)
- property_address: the full street address with city
- bedroom_count: number of bedrooms listed (include ranges like 1-3 beds)
- amenities_features: all amenities, features, square footage, bathrooms listed
- property_url: the complete URL link to view this specific listing

Extract ALL {max_results} visible rental listings from the page with complete data.
